name: Dicey Nights
description:
Dicey Nights Description

Dado was ready to spend some sweet time with his lover Dada when something terrible happened, they got trapped in a series of dungeons!
But our hero has recently acquired an incredible superpower: the ability to control the elements!
Will you help Dado reach his beloved in order for them to have their Dicey Night?

Leave a message with your total number of moves (provided on the end screen after the 11 levels)! 
Will you be able to beat the developers score? Will you find the secret room?

Instructions
  • Use the WASD/Arrow Keys to move. Every movement is going to make Dado roll, changing his top face!
  • Sometimes, some of Dado's faces will have "Effects" on them. If said faces end up on top, their related effect will be applied!
  • Use the orthogonal view of the die to help predict which face will be active after a movement!
Contributors
  • Vanny96 - Lead developer
  • Zaibas1220 - Developer, Art Support
  • KaneYurey26 - Art

Music taken from:

  • https://opengameart.org/content/mushroom-dance
  • https://opengameart.org/content/green-gray
